page.title: 17Andoversford-Public House(2)
page.content: When asked about a funny incident Mr.Farley said "One day I took an old bloke his drink but when Igot there he was dead." He has never had any money problems like peole saying that he has charged them too much. He has had to throw out a few drunk people who have come from parties.A lot of people visit the pub. He does not have a children"s room but he does have a garden with swings in it. He owned three other pubs in Cheltenham before he came to the Royal Oak.One of these was the Garrick's Head. All ages visit the pub which is open seven days a week.
